columns.blockSubtitle: To Dads With Love, a Justia Tribute
description: Justia couldn’t do what we do without all of the hard-working fathers on our team. In honor of Father’s Day, we want to say thanks. Here’s to you, Dads of Justia :)
The pugs would like to introduce you to their work pal's pup! Meet Marina’s dog, Kirbie. She is four years old, snores often, and loves playing with a good squeaky toy. :)
